title: Kyrylo Romanyuk
text:
Kyrylo Serhiyovych Romanyuk (; born 21 March 2001) is a Ukrainian amateur <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> <a href="Defender%20%28football%29">defender</a> who plays for <a href="FC%20Lokomotyv%20Kyiv">Lokomotyv Kyiv</a>.
Career.
Romanyuk is a product mainly of Dnipro and Shakhtar Donetsk youth sportive school systems.
He made his début for <a href="FC%20Mariupol">FC Mariupol</a> in the <a href="Ukrainian%20Premier%20League">Ukrainian Premier League</a> as a substituted player in the additional time of a match against defending champion <a href="FC%20Shakhtar%20Donetsk">FC Shakhtar Donetsk</a> on 1 December 2019.
Personal life.
His twin brother <a href="Bohdan%20Romanyuk">Bohdan</a> is also a professional footballer.
